channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The meat recall has gone stratospheric with nearly 12 million pounds of meat and poultry possibly contaminated with listeria
item.description: That brings the total to 11.7 million pounds.

item.title: For North Korea, War in Ukraine Is a Coveted Chance for Military Practice
item.description: Helping Russia in the war is an opportunity for North Korea to test its new weapons, and Ukrainian officials say the North’s troops are also gaining d...

item.title: Zelensky Pitches ‘Victory Plan’ in Ukraine’s Parliament
item.description: The proposal would rely heavily on increased Western assistance. So far, it has drawn a lukewarm response from Ukraine’s allies.

item.title: Zelensky Pitches ‘Victory Plan’ in Ukraine’s Parliament
item.description: The proposal would rely heavily on increased Western assistance. So far, it has drawn a lukewarm response from Ukraine’s allies.

item.title: For North Korea, War in Ukraine Is a Coveted Chance for Military Practice
item.description: Helping Russia in the war is an opportunity for North Korea to test its new weapons, and Ukrainian officials say the North’s troops are also gaining d...

item.title: The University of Michigan Doubled Down on D.E.I. What Went Wrong?
item.description: A decade and a quarter of a billion dollars later, students and faculty are more frustrated than ever.

item.title: IUDs and Breast Cancer Risk: What to Know
item.description: A new study adds to the evidence on hormonal contraceptives and breast cancer. But experts stressed the overall risk remains low.

item.title: LVMH’s Bernard Arnault sees nearly $10 billion in wealth wiped out after share price bloodbath
item.description: In March, Bernard Arnault was the world’s richest person—with $48 billion more to his name.

item.title: Andreessen Horowitz says crypto activity reached all-time high in 2024
item.description: There are between 30 to 60 million global crypto users, a16z’s 2024 State of Crypto report estimates.

item.title: Appointment of Thomas Tuchel, a German, Is Met With Pushback From England Soccer Fans
item.description: The appointment of Thomas Tuchel to coach the England men’s national soccer team has provoked, well, some strong feelings.

item.title: Israel Allows Some Aid Into Northern Gaza After U.S. Warning
item.description: There was no official response from the Israeli government, a day after the United States threatened consequences if it didn’t let more relief into Ga...

item.title: Live Updates: Israel Strikes Near Beirut for First Time in Days
item.description: The attacks, which also hit southern Lebanon, came after the United States expressed concerns about the bombardment of the Lebanese capital. Israel’s ...

item.title: Fleeing Israeli Bombs, the Displaced in Lebanon Search for Safety
item.description: Schools, clubs and parks have become places of refuge as the displaced seek safety amid Israeli bombings.

item.title: WNBA legend Sue Bird on teamwork: ‘If the country was run the way sports teams are, we’d be in a better place’
item.description: During an appearance at Fortune’s Most Powerful Women Summit, Bird reflected on which skills from her playing career served her best in the “real worl...

item.title: Serena Williams just had a cyst ‘the size of a small grapefruit’ in her neck. Here’s what it means
item.description: The benign branchial cyst just “kept growing,” prompting its removal.
